Uses of Package
adept.serialization

Packages that use adept.serialization
adept.restapi Provides interfaces for accessing DEFT algorithms as RESTful services 
adept.serialization Provides interfaces and classes for ADEPT data (de)serialization in XML, JSON and Binary format 
adept.utilities Provides utility classes and functions for creating ADEPT Document objects, for tokenization, regression test, benchmark test, profiler, command-line application and file conversions. 
 

Classes in adept.serialization used by adept.restapi
JSONSerializer
          JSON serializer.
 

Classes in adept.serialization used by adept.serialization

          Abstract class for serialization that enforces a srialization type to be specified.

          Interface that supports methods for serialization.
JSONSerializer
          JSON serializer.

          The Enum SerializationType.
